titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Hastings (FL) moved to table the resolution.
On motion to table the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 189 (Roll No. 54).

bill.summary: 1/24/2007--Introduced. Disapproves certain actions taken by the Majority on the Committee on Rules (refusal to produce for the Ranking Member a copy of a letter from another Minority Member requesting withdrawal of an amendment he had submitted for the Committee's consideration regarding H.Res. 78). Directs the Chairwoman of the Committee to undertake practices to prevent future occurrences.
